meanings.definition: A left-handed person, especially a left-handed baseball pitcher.
meanings.sent1: In baseball, the southpaw pitcher threw the ball with their left hand.
meanings.sent2: The team needed a southpaw to pitch in the game.
meanings.sent3: The southpaw pitcher made the batter dizzy with their tricky throws.
meanings.sent4: Her left hand was like a southpaw weapon on the pitcher's mound.
meanings.sent5: The southpaw's unique style of pitching stood out among the right-handers.

meanings.sent1: The boxer delivered a powerful southpaw punch to his opponent.
meanings.sent2: He trained hard to perfect his southpaw boxing technique.
meanings.sent3: The southpaw boxer surprised everyone with his quick left hook.
meanings.sent4: Her southpaw punch was as swift as a striking snake.
meanings.sent5: The southpaw's left-handed punches were his signature move in the ring.
